getPPodIdLabelPairs

getStudyByPPodId

Study getStudyByPPodId(java.lang.String pPodId)
Retrieve a Study given its pPOD id. Returns null if pPodId == null.

Parameters:
pPodId - the pPOD id of the Study we want - null is legal
Returns:
a Study given its pPOD id or null if pPodId == null
